data.title: Deva to Ashwatthama: Check out Shahid Kapoor's upcoming films after TBMAUJ success
data.meta_description: After delivering the first hit of 2024, Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya, Shahid Kapoor has a terrific lineup. From cop thriller to period dramas, check out Shahid Kapoor's upcoming film' list.
data.text:
Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon's 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' became the first hit of 2024.

Rigged on a budget of Rs 70 crore, 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya' collected over Rs 133 crore and proved to be the comeback of Shahid Kapoor after blockbuster 'Kabir Singh'.

Afer 'TBMAUJ,' Shahid Kapoor has an impressive film lineup ahead of him. Here are 3 upcoming films by Shahid that might redefine his stardom.

Shahid is currently working on this film with director Roshan Andrews. Pooja Hedge will star in this film alongside Shahid.

'Deva' is an action thriller that will tell the story of a daredevil cop. The film will be released on October 11, 2024.

Pooja Entertainment recently announced this magnum opus, starring Shahid Kapoor in the lead role. It is touted to be one of the biggest films in Shahid's career.

A recent Pinkvilla report stated that Shahid has signed a film that will tell the untold stories about Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's life.
